ingredients.name: reduced-fat, reduced-sodium cream of chicken soup

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch casserole dish.

substeps.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

steps.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook egg noodles in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 9 minutes. Drain and transfer noodles to the prepared casserole dish.

substeps.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook egg noodles in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 9 minutes.
Drain and transfer noodles to the prepared casserole dish.

steps.text: Top noodles with chicken, ham, and Swiss cheese.

substeps.text: Top noodles with chicken, ham, and Swiss cheese.

steps.text: Mix together condensed soup, milk, and sour cream in a medium bowl until combined; spoon over noodle mixture in the casserole dish.

substeps.text: Mix together condensed soup, milk, and sour cream in a medium bowl until combined; spoon over noodle mixture in the casserole dish.

steps.text: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese in hot butter until crumbs are well coated, 2 to 3 minutes. Sprinkle over casserole.

substeps.text: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese in hot butter until crumbs are well coated, 2 to 3 minutes.

steps.text: Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling and lightly browned, about 30 minutes.

substeps.text: Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling and lightly browned, about 30 minutes.

steps.text: Allow to cool slightly before serving.

substeps.text: Allow to cool slightly before serving.
